title: POI S3E04 Reasonable Doubt, p2 [Shaw]
author: Root & Shaw
comment: When Shaw says 'where is you're Powder Room?' you wonder if she means the place where the explosives are kept :-)
That book club scene always cracks me up.
description:
Shaw attends Book Club.

Episode summary:
Reese and Finch's next number is that of Vanessa Watkins (Kathleen Rose Perkins), a prominent New York prosecutor who is accused of killing her defense attorney husband, Jeremy. The police find a gun with her DNA on it and arrest her. Vanessa escapes police custody, triggering a manhunt for her across New York. Carter tries to help her, but Vanessa says that no one can help her, though she insists that she did not kill Jeremy before escaping. Finch investigates Jeremy's murder and learns that he owed a great deal of money to a gangster. Watkins proves to be a clever woman, discrediting the witness against her. But is she guilty or not? Reese, Finch and Carter decide to question her themselves to get to the truth.

October 15, 2013
